location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 319: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, transmits the receipt (not included) of a payment made to Sheikh Ahmed ben Khulfan, Chief of Asseeloo [Bandar-e `Asaluyeh].
